definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: I went down to the local kmart and looked for a clothesline and clothespin.
sentences.chinese: 我來到本地的凱馬特百貨商店，想要買晾衣繩和夾子。

sentences.english: Will you say you be able to mange a department store?
sentences.chinese: 您認爲您有能力管理一家百貨商店嗎？

sentences.english: There is a department store just before the road bisects.
sentences.chinese: 分叉的地方有一家百貨商店。

sentences.english: The department store hired professional designer to display its goods in the window.
sentences.chinese: 百貨商店聘請了專業設計師在其櫥窗裏陳列商品。

sentences.english: Some middle school students are window-shopping outside the department store.
sentences.chinese: 一些中學生在百貨商店外面看櫥窗。

sentences.english: My house stands cheek by jowl with a department store.
sentences.chinese: 我家緊靠一家百貨商店。

sentences.english: The department store had some shirts it had carried over from last year.
sentences.chinese: 這家百貨商店存有一些去年留下的襯衣。

sentences.english: The dry-goods and general stores sold them.
sentences.chinese: 鞋子只在布店和百貨商店有售。

sentences.english: She wants to transform it from a successful department store into an elite one.
sentences.chinese: 她想要從一個成功的百貨商店轉型爲一個精英店。

sentences.english: Household goods ranging from toilet paper to clingfilm wereflung into the street from outdoor shelves in front of a drugstore.
sentences.chinese: 一家百貨商店的貨品從廁紙到保鮮膜散落一地。

sentences.english: He then clerked it in a department store.
sentences.chinese: 他當時在一家百貨商店當店員。

sentences.english: He crooked a necklace from that department store.
sentences.chinese: 他從那家百貨商店裏偷到一條項鍊。

sentences.english: Are In-Store Shops a Problem for Department Stores?
sentences.chinese: 店中店會否成爲百貨商店的累贅？

sentences.english: Posters were emblazoned on the walls of the department store.
sentences.chinese: 百貨商店的牆壁上貼滿了五彩繽紛的廣告畫。

sentences.english: Department stores display their goods in the windows.
sentences.chinese: 百貨商店把商品陳列在櫥窗裏。

sentences.english: Department stores are often congested before Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節前百貨商店裏常常很擁擠。

definition: variant of 戰略伙伴|战略伙伴[zhan4 lu:e4 huo3 ban4]
Xinhui district of Jiangmen city 江門市|江门市, Guangdong
to sell as agent/to sell on commission (e.g. insurance policies)/proxy sale (of stocks)

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1

definition: to play yabao (a gambling game)/(fig.) to gamble on/to take one's chance/to try one's luck
